snippet: A 68-year-old man died on Sunday, days after he was attacked while walking near his home in the East Village.
abstract: Ruan Wen Hui, man who was attacked and beaten about a block from his home in the East Village by an unknown assailant, dies from his injuries.
lead_paragraph: A 68-year-old man died on Sunday, days after he was attacked while walking near his home in the East Village.

headline.main: Two Days After He Was Beaten, East Village Assault Victim Dies
headline.print_headline: Two Days After He Was Beaten, East Village Assault Victim Dies
